meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Richards Nikhil Damle Andrew Pau Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7283.

td.p: Amanda Richards, a music teacher from Macon, Georgia
Nikhil Damle, an attorney from Torrance, California
Andrew Pau, an assistant professor from Amherst, Ohio (whose 3-day cash winnings total $105,202)

tr.td: ALABAMA HISTORY
WHAT'S YOUR SIGN?
THE THIRD WORD
SPACECRAFT TYPES
MY WIFE!
(Jimmy: A treasure trove of the artifacts behind some of the world's most beloved entertainment.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Andrew: What is Birmingham?)

Montgomery (Alabama)

AndrewAmanda
')

Nikhil

CLEANING OUT MY ATTIC
